### 💰 Price

**Sofas under £2,000** (base prices for standard configurations - final price varies by size, fabric tier & cover type)

- **Midhurst Sofa** in V&A Collection Botanical Collage All Over: **£1,937**
- **Petworth 3 Seater Sofa** in Mulberry Flying Ducks: **£1,941**

*Essentials fabrics stay close to base. Premium adds £200-400. Luxury adds £400-800.*

### ✨ Key Features

• Hardwood frame with lifetime guarantee  
• Duck feather cushions  
• Handmade in UK (8-12 week delivery)

### 🎯 Opportunities to Enhance

> **Add matching footstool** - From £495  
> **Upgrade to Premium fabric** - Adds £200-400  
> **Add scatter cushions** - From £45 each  
> **Create a suite with matching chair** - From £800

### 💬 What would you like to know next?
- Price for Midhurst 2 seater  
- Show Petworth in blue  
- Compare Midhurst vs Petworth  
- Footstool for Petworth
